item.title: Blessed Burden
item.description: [[songs/t/the_last_internationale/we_will_reign/life_liberty_and_the_pursuit_of_indian_blood.md#blood-vyl-wnanory|March. 1945 unwanted from his first breath.]] [[songs/t/the_last_internationale/we_will_reign/life_liberty_and_the_pursuit_of_indian_blood.md#blood-vyl-wnanory|A mother’s blessing born, a father’s burden worn.]] [[songs/t/the_last_internationale/we_will_reign/life_liberty_and_the_pursuit_of_indian_blood.md#blood-vyl-wnanory|The bright shine of the sunrise along the tile floor to the open door.

item.title: Carrying Weight
item.description: [[songs/k/korn/the_paradigm_shift/die_another_day.md#slowly-escaping-vyl-wnanory|That soap box song stuck in his head.]] [[songs/k/korn/the_paradigm_shift/die_another_day.md#slowly-escaping-vyl-wnanory|Burdens lie in graves past by.]] [[songs/k/korn/the_paradigm_shift/die_another_day.md#slowly-escaping-vyl-wnanory|He carries his weight. that anthem for the disenchanted rings loud in waves of grain.

item.title: Cowardice
item.description: [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/bites/assimilate.md#oil-remove-vyl-wnanory|“There’s no place for me.”]] [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/bites/assimilate.md#oil-remove-vyl-wnanory|A man of nowhere, a man of black heart from the dead end streets.]] [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/bites/assimilate.

item.title: Debts
item.description: [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/bites/assimilate.md#oil-remove-vyl-wnanory|It still looks the same here after all these years.]] [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/bites/assimilate.md#oil-remove-vyl-wnanory|The junkies and the steamboat men, the sun never set on them here.

item.title: Everything Went Quiet
item.description: [[songs/f/flobots/fight_with_tools/theres_a_war_going_on_for_your_mind.md#theres-a-war-going-on-for-your-mind-vyl-wnanory|Roll on through to the other side of town.]] [[songs/f/flobots/fight_with_tools/theres_a_war_going_on_for_your_mind.md#theres-a-war-going-on-for-your-mind-vyl-wnanory|Passed the quarry, the river beds, over bridges and bunker sheds.

item.title: Forgiver Forgetter
item.description: [[songs/l/lamb_of_god/ashes_of_the_wake/remorse_is_for_the_dead.md#the-dirty-lord-of-the-manor-surveys-his-filthy-domain-vyl-wnanory|He awoke in a cold sweat to those old sounds of heartbreak.]] [[songs/l/lamb_of_god/ashes_of_the_wake/remorse_is_for_the_dead.md#the-dirty-lord-of-the-manor-surveys-his-filthy-domain-vyl-wnanory|His brother at his side screaming “This isn’t your fight.

item.title: Moon Shine
item.description: [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/catastrophe.md#im-tired-of-whack-rappers-and-fame-seekers-vyl-wnanory|“If you’re always running, you ain’t no kind of man. face up your fears kid, fight for what you take stock in.

item.title: Nameless Streets
item.description: [[songs/l/linkin_park/the_hunting_party/wastelands.md#this-is-war-with-no-weapons-marching-with-no-stepping-vyl-wnanory|As a kid the summers seemed so long.]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/the_hunting_party/wastelands.md#this-is-war-with-no-weapons-marching-with-no-stepping-vyl-wnanory|The dusk; a never ending song.]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/the_hunting_party/wastelands.md#this-is-war-with-no-weapons-marching-with-no-stepping-vyl-wnanory|Too much, too young.]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/the_hunting_party/wastelands.md#this-is-war-with-no-weapons-marching-with-no-stepping-vyl-wnanory|He’d never hear it again.

item.title: Prophet In Plain Clothes
item.description: [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/reset/death_machine.md#generation-collapses-vyl-wnanory|He walks the streets collar up to the snowfall.]] [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/reset/death_machine.md#generation-collapses-vyl-wnanory|Holes in pockets and knees.]] [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/reset/death_machine.md#generation-collapses-vyl-wnanory|Sleeps in bar rooms and horse stalls.

item.title: The Blues
item.description: [[songs/m/massive_attack/heligoland/psyche.md#ridicule-they-wont-allow-vyl-wnanory|He found himself waiting again.]] [[songs/m/massive_attack/heligoland/psyche.md#ridicule-they-wont-allow-vyl-wnanory|Out at the crossroads, out on the lam.]] [[songs/m/massive_attack/heligoland/psyche.md#ridicule-they-wont-allow-vyl-wnanory|This time not running, this time by right.

item.title: The City By Dawn
item.description: [[songs/r/ra_the_rugged_man/all_my_heroes_are_dead/who_do_we_trust.md#theres-a-new-housing-plan-for-the-ghetto-eventually-vyl-wnanory|Hard rain fell. Chalk it up to a failure.]] [[songs/r/ra_the_rugged_man/all_my_heroes_are_dead/who_do_we_trust.md#theres-a-new-housing-plan-for-the-ghetto-eventually-vyl-wnanory|Push through the cold weather.]] [[songs/r/ra_the_rugged_man/all_my_heroes_are_dead/who_do_we_trust.md#theres-a-new-housing-plan-for-the-ghetto-eventually-vyl-wnanory|Racing heart, slow the beat, push through the defeat.
